data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

Expensive ____ luxurious ____, ____ and ____ as ____ as ____ taxes ____ the ____ a ____ location ____ the ____ people ____ the ____. The Formula 1 Monaco Grand Prix is ____ too ____ attracts ____ tourists. The Monte Carlo Casino attracts gamblers from around the world.
data.partBlankContent: Monaco is well-known around the world for being a place for the rich and famous. Expensive a__ luxurious res____, hot___ and apart_____ as we__ as l__ taxes ma__ the cou____ a pop____ location f__ the ric____ people i_ the wo___. data.fullContent: Monaco is well-known around the world for being a place for the rich and famous. Expensive and luxurious resorts, hotels and apartments as well as low taxes make the country a popular location for the richest people in the world. The Formula 1 Monaco Grand Prix is famous too and attracts many tourists. The Monte Carlo Casino attracts gamblers from around the world.
data.answer: 摩纳哥是世界闻名的富人和名人之地。昂贵豪华的度假村、酒店和公寓，以及低税率，使该国成为世界上最富有的人的热门地点。f1摩纳哥大奖赛也很有名，吸引了很多游客。蒙特卡洛赌场吸引了来自世界各地的赌客。
